messages.message: @Heymian both. There will be a broader set of classifications and then more detailed kinds that will have to be pretty specific.
the specific stuff might end up having to be tags. I have super mixed feelings about tickets/tags in general when it comes to support, but our volume is so low that it'll actually be fine/needed.

Goal is initially be able to say something like that over the last 6 months we had NNN support tickets that were 30% s were performance related, 20% sales related, 40% how to, and 10% flow related (totally spit balling that). Then break it down by customer and get the more granular stuff, some of which would probably be customer specific.
got it, that makes perfect sense
when we really start doing saas stuff it'll get really interesting :slightly_smiling_face:
once we're there support can start publishing some data monthly that I think will be super helpful :slightly_smiling_face:
